mapper.update: update zstudent_event set zstatus =#{zstatus} where zstudentID=#{zstudentID} and ztype=#{ztype} and zstatus='申请中'
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM zstudnet_event WHERE zstudentID=#{zstudentID} AND ztype='请假' and zstatus='申请中';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zstudent_event (zid, zstudentID, ztype, zcontent ,zapplicationtime, zhandletime,zstatus) VALUES(#{zid}, #{zstudentID}, #{ztype}, #{zcontent} ,#{zapplicationtime}, #{zhandletime},#{zstatus});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM zstudent_event WHERE zstudentID=#{zstudentID} and ztype=#{ztype}
mapper.select: select max(a.zapplicationtime),a.zid,a.zstudentID,a.ztype,a.zcontent,a.zstatus,a.zhandletime from (SELECT * FROM zstudent_event WHERE zstatus ="申请中" AND (TIME_TO_SEC(NOW())- TIME_TO_SEC(zapplicationtime)<3600) AND zstudentID=(SELECT zstudentID FROM zstudent_login WHERE zrecognizeIP=(SELECT zstudentPCIP FROM ztraining_facility WHERE zid=#{zid})))a
